last_episode_to_air.name: Chosen
last_episode_to_air.overview: After killing Caleb, Buffy conceives a plan to defeat the First once and for all. Willow invokes a magic spell that alters the ancient Slayer spell and gives Buffy the allies she needs to fight the Uber-Vamp army. An epic battle ensues and several good friends are lost. At the end, Buffy faces a completely new problem -- one she's glad to have.

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
overview: Into every generation a slayer is born: one girl in all the world, a chosen one. She alone will wield the strength and skill to fight the vampires, demons, and the forces of darkness; to stop the spread of their evil and the swell of their number. She is the Slayer.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Featurettes, Interviews, the Cast Reunion and the unaired pilot

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After moving to Sunnydale, California, Buffy Anne Summers just wants to be a normal teenager. Back in Los Angeles, her first Watcher had died; she inadvertently burned down the gymnasium at her old high school; and her parents got a divorce. The move to Sunnydale is supposed to give both her and her mother, Joyce, a clean slate. But then she meets the school librarian, Rupert Giles, and quickly learns there is no escaping her destiny. With Giles as her new Watcher, she reluctantly steps back into her role as the Slayer. But this time she is not fighting alone. She now has an inner circle of special friends-- Willow, Xander, Cordelia, and a mysterious young man named Angel-- ready to join the fight and drive in a stake or two if need be.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: New vampires Spike and Drusilla come to town along with the new slayer, Kendra Young, who was activated as a result of Buffy's brief death in the season one finale. Xander becomes involved with Cordelia, while Willow becomes involved with witchcraft and Daniel "Oz" Osbourne becomes a werewolf after being bitten by a young cousin who just happens to be a werewolf. Buffy and the vampire Angel develop a relationship over the course of the season, but Angel's dark past as the evil and sadistic Angelus threatens to destroy Buffy and the world.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Buffy returns from the big city to find her friends have been battling the forces of evil without her. As she struggles to regain her mother's and her friends' trust, a new slayer named Faith arrives in town, quickly winning over all of Buffy's friends. But Faith's arrival is just the beginning of new forces Buffy must face. For a few nights later she encounters Angel, who has somehow returned, feral and violent from the hellish demon dimension where Buffy had sent him. But the real demon Buffy must ultimately face is already on this side of the portal, preparing a special graduation day surprise for Sunnydale High.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Buffy begins college feeling completely overwhelmed...but once the monsters show up, it's just like old times. Then she starts dating Riley, a handsome commando battling the same monsters. He's part of a secret organization called The Initiative, and Buffy is all too happy to join the team. But she soon suspects The Initiative may be more dangerous than the monsters they are supposed to be battling...

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: After an unsettling encounter with the Dracula, Buffy asks Giles to once again be her Watcher. Luckily he agrees, for Buffy is about to face mortal problems far more threatening than the undead.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Elated with having Buffy back from the dead, her friends never wonder if she may have been in a better place.

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: As Buffy accompanies Dawn on her first day at the new Sunnydale High, Giles continues Willow's magic education in England. But while Buffy is surprised to be offered a guidance counselor job, Willow is shocked to experience a horrific future vision of the Hellmouth.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Hellmouth
episodes.overview: When teen vampire slayer Buffy tries to start a new life at Sunnydale High, she discovers that the school sits atop a demonic dimensional portal.

episodes.name: The Harvest
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends encounter a powerful vampire bent on opening a portal to a dimension inhabited by demons.

episodes.name: Witch
episodes.overview: Buffy suspects she has a witch on her hands when the cheerleading squad falls victim to sudden blindness and spontaneous combustion.

episodes.name: Teacher's Pet
episodes.overview: Buffy's biology teacher is killed by a giant praying mantis that assumes the form of a beautiful substitute teacher.

episodes.name: Never Kill a Boy on the First Date
episodes.overview: With Buffy preoccupied by her date with Owen, Giles is trapped by a group of vampires seeking to raise a powerful leader.

episodes.name: The Pack
episodes.overview: Xander and several other students are possessed by the spirit of a demonic breed of hyenas that wreak havoc at the high school.

episodes.name: Angel
episodes.overview: Buffy discovers Angel's dark secret and hesitates to do anything about it, which could spell danger for someone she loves.

episodes.name: I, Robot... You, Jane
episodes.overview: Willow's new Internet chat buddy turns out to be a powerful demon electronically unleashed from a centuries-old, newly digitized book.

episodes.name: The Puppet Show
episodes.overview: Buffy suspects that a ventriloquist's dummy may be harvesting organs from classmates performing in a talent show.

episodes.name: Nightmares
episodes.overview: A series of strange occurrences lead Buffy and her friends to discover that their worst nightmares have literally become reality.

episodes.name: Out of Mind, Out of Sight
episodes.overview: When an invisible menace starts attacking students and faculty at Sunnydale High, the Scooby Gang traces the problem back to Cordelia.

episodes.name: Prophecy Girl
episodes.overview: Buffy's life may hang in the balance as Giles uncovers an ancient book that foretells not only her death, but also the end of the world.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After moving to Sunnydale, California, Buffy Anne Summers just wants to be a normal teenager. Back in Los Angeles, her first Watcher had died; she inadvertently burned down the gymnasium at her old high school; and her parents got a divorce. The move to Sunnydale is supposed to give both her and her mother, Joyce, a clean slate. But then she meets the school librarian, Rupert Giles, and quickly learns there is no escaping her destiny. With Giles as her new Watcher, she reluctantly steps back into her role as the Slayer. But this time she is not fighting alone. She now has an inner circle of special friends-- Willow, Xander, Cordelia, and a mysterious young man named Angel-- ready to join the fight and drive in a stake or two if need be.

episodes.name: When She Was Bad
episodes.overview: Buffy returns from summer vacation sporting an attitude and suffers from recurring nightmares involving the Master. Meanwhile, the Anointed One and his followers plot their revenge.

episodes.name: Some Assembly Required
episodes.overview: Two science club nerds use body parts to create the "perfect girlfriend" for a teenager who has been brought back from the dead.

episodes.name: School Hard
episodes.overview: Buffy's mother and friends become trapped inside Sunnydale High School when a vampire named Spike launches an attack against the Slayer on Parent-Teacher night.

episodes.name: Inca Mummy Girl
episodes.overview: An Ican Princess mummy is reanimated in Sunnydale where she sucks the life force from others in order to stay alive.

guest_stars.character: Ampata Gutierrez / The Inca Mummy Girl
guest_stars.name: Ara Celi

episodes.name: Reptile Boy
episodes.overview: Buffy and Cordelia attend a frat party where they are offered as human sacrifices to a reptile-like creature.

episodes.name: Halloween
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends patronize an unusual costume shop where customers turn into whatever costume they are wearing.

episodes.name: Lie to Me
episodes.overview: Buffy is lured into a trap by a group of undead wannabes who hope that Spike will make them vampires in exchange for giving him the Slayer.

episodes.name: The Dark Age
episodes.overview: Giles' past comes back to haunt him as a demon he and Ethan Rayne summoned in their wild youth seeks them out in Sunnydale.

episodes.name: What's My Line? (1)
episodes.overview: Spike brings in three professional bounty hunters to eliminate Buffy while she ponders on what her profession might be if her fate wasn't already sealed.

episodes.name: What's My Line? (2)
episodes.overview: Buffy joins forces with another Slayer in hopes of saving Angel from the clutches of Spike and Drusilla.

episodes.name: Ted
episodes.overview: Buffy's mom introduces her new boyfriend, who charms everyone except Buffy. When she confronts his dark side, she is left questioning her actions.

episodes.name: Bad Eggs
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends encounter even more trouble than expected when the eggs they are given in health class turn out to be prehistoric parasites that take over their lives.

episodes.name: Surprise
episodes.overview: To give Buffy a surprise on her 17th birthday, Drusilla and Spike bring together the body parts of a dismembered demon who cannot be killed.

episodes.name: Innocence
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends battle the Judge and face unexpected danger from Angel, who has lost his soul after experiencing a moment of true happiness.

episodes.name: Phases
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends discover secrets about themselves as they battle a werewolf, its hunter, and their own emotions.

episodes.name: Bewitched, Bothered and Bewildered
episodes.overview: As Valentine's Day approaches, Xander tries to improve his love life through witchcraft and finds himself with too much of a good thing.

episodes.name: Passion
episodes.overview: Angel steps up his torment of Buffy and her friends as Jenny searches for a way to restore his soul.

episodes.name: Killed by Death
episodes.overview: While hospitalized with a severe case of the flu, Buffy battles a demon that sucks the life out of sick children.

episodes.name: I Only Have Eyes for You
episodes.overview: Sunnydale High School is haunted by the ghosts of a former student and teacher who reenact their tragic romance through the bodies of the school's current inhabitants.

episodes.name: Go Fish
episodes.overview: Members of the Sunnydale swim team are killed by a gill monster of unknown origins.

episodes.name: Becoming (1)
episodes.overview: Angel plots to revive an ancient demon bent on sweeping everything on earth into hell itself.

episodes.name: Becoming (2)
episodes.overview: Spike strikes an unlikely alliance with Buffy to keep Angel from destroying the world.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: New vampires Spike and Drusilla come to town along with the new slayer, Kendra Young, who was activated as a result of Buffy's brief death in the season one finale. Xander becomes involved with Cordelia, while Willow becomes involved with witchcraft and Daniel "Oz" Osbourne becomes a werewolf after being bitten by a young cousin who just happens to be a werewolf. Buffy and the vampire Angel develop a relationship over the course of the season, but Angel's dark past as the evil and sadistic Angelus threatens to destroy Buffy and the world.

episodes.name: Anne
episodes.overview: Buffy -- living on her own in a big city -- assists a girl whose boyfriend has mysteriously vanished. Back in Sunnydale, Buffy's friends do their best to battle the forces of evil without her.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Party
episodes.overview: A Nigerian mask reanimates the dead, forcing Buffy to battle a horde of zombies.

episodes.name: Faith, Hope & Trick
episodes.overview: A charismatic Slayer visits Sunnydale and wins over many of Buffy's friends. Meanwhile, two powerful vampires plot an attack.

episodes.name: Beauty and the Beasts
episodes.overview: Oz becomes the prime suspect when a series of animal-like attacks occur in Sunnydale.

episodes.name: Homecoming
episodes.overview: As Buffy and Cordelia vie for Homecoming Queen, a group of killers gather to participate in SlayerFest '98.

episodes.name: Band Candy
episodes.overview: Mr Trick enlists Giles' old buddy Ethan Rayne to manufacture and distribute boxes of candy which turn the adult population into uninhibited, irresponsible teenagers to keep them out of the way while the mysterious Mayor Wilkins pays a tribute to a demon.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: With some help from Faith's new watcher, Buffy seeks to destroy a weapon-like glove before it falls into the hands of a demon.

episodes.name: Lovers Walk
episodes.overview: Spike returns to Sunnydale and kidnaps Willow in hopes of creating a magic spell that will make Drusilla love him again.

episodes.name: The Wish
episodes.overview: Cordelia's wish for a Buffy-free Sunnydale comes true, plunging her into a world where vampires have control of the town.

episodes.name: Amends
episodes.overview: As the Christmas holiday approaches, Angel is tormented by evil apparitions who want him to eliminate Buffy.

episodes.name: Gingerbread
episodes.overview: After discovering the corpses of two young children bearing a symbol linked to the occult, Joyce spearheads a campaign to rid Sunnydale of witches.

episodes.name: Helpless
episodes.overview: As her birthday approaches, Buffy loses her slayer powers and must do battle with a vampire who is not only extremely powerful but also quite mad.

episodes.name: The Zeppo
episodes.overview: Xander experiences an adventure of his own when he encounters a group of reanimated corpses out to construct a bomb. Meanwhile, Buffy and her friends battle the forces of evil when the Hellmouth reopens.

episodes.name: Bad Girls
episodes.overview: Faith convinces Buffy to live on the wild side, with fatal consequences.

episodes.name: Consequences
episodes.overview: A homicide detective closes in on Buffy and Faith as he investigates the deputy mayor's death.

episodes.name: Doppelgangland
episodes.overview: While casting a magic spell, Anya and Willow accidentally summon Willow's evil double from an alternate universe.

episodes.name: Enemies
episodes.overview: As Faith attempts to seduce Angel and steal his soul, the Mayor summons a dark-magic demon to finish the job.

episodes.name: Earshot
episodes.overview: A mouthless demon infects Buffy with the ability to hear everyone's thoughts, but what starts out as a useful power soon turns into a curse.

episodes.name: Choices
episodes.overview: The Mayor takes Willow prisoner after Buffy and her friends steal away a box containing demonic energy needed for Ascension Day.

episodes.name: The Prom
episodes.overview: After Angel breaks off their relationship, Buffy single-handedly battles three fearsome hell hounds so that her classmates can enjoy their senior prom.

episodes.name: Graduation Day (1)
episodes.overview: In an effort to distract Buffy from the Ascension, the mayor instructs Faith to poison Angel.

episodes.name: Graduation Day (2)
episodes.overview: On Ascension Day, Buffy and her friends prepare for the ultimate battle as they face off against the mayor and a horde of vampires.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Buffy returns from the big city to find her friends have been battling the forces of evil without her. As she struggles to regain her mother's and her friends' trust, a new slayer named Faith arrives in town, quickly winning over all of Buffy's friends. But Faith's arrival is just the beginning of new forces Buffy must face. For a few nights later she encounters Angel, who has somehow returned, feral and violent from the hellish demon dimension where Buffy had sent him. But the real demon Buffy must ultimately face is already on this side of the portal, preparing a special graduation day surprise for Sunnydale High.

episodes.name: The Freshman
episodes.overview: Buffy feels like a fish out of water in her first year at college, but the mysterious disappearance of a fellow student puts her back in her element.

episodes.name: Living Conditions
episodes.overview: Buffy finds herself at odds with her new roommate and is troubled by a series of disturbing dreams involving a soul-sucking demon.

episodes.name: The Harsh Light of Day
episodes.overview: As Buffy gets to know a charming student named Parker, Spike searches for a ring that, according to legend, makes the wearer invincible.

episodes.name: Fear, Itself
episodes.overview: On Halloween, Buffy and her friends find themselves trapped inside a haunted frat house complete with real bats, zombies, and a terrifying demon.

episodes.name: Beer Bad
episodes.overview: Xander finds employment as a bartender at a pub where some of Buffy's friends turn into terrifying Cro-Magnon creatures.

episodes.name: Wild at Heart
episodes.overview: When Oz falls hard for a sexy singer who also happens to be a werewolf, he must choose between Willow and his own animal instincts.

episodes.name: The Initiative
episodes.overview: Spike finds himself targeted by a group of commandos after he escapes from a military lab underneath the Sunnydale campus.

episodes.name: Pangs
episodes.overview: On Thanksgiving, Buffy encounters the spirit of a Native American warrior whose people were wiped out by settlers.

episodes.name: Something Blue
episodes.overview: One of Willow's spells causes her statements to become reality, with consequences both entertaining and life-threatening.

episodes.name: Hush
episodes.overview: When everyone in Sunnydale loses their voice, the Scooby Gang must silently solve the mystery of the monsters who stole their ability to speak.

episodes.name: Doomed
episodes.overview: While attempting to redefine her relationship with Riley, Buffy must also stop demons that are determined to reopen the Hellmouth.

episodes.name: A New Man
episodes.overview: Ethan Rayne returns to town and transforms Giles into a demon. Spike is the only one who can help.

episodes.name: The I in Team
episodes.overview: Buffy teams with Riley after she is allowed access to the Initiative; Spike is targeted by commandos.

episodes.name: Goodbye Iowa
episodes.overview: Tension erupts between Buffy and an ailing Riley as they pursue Professor Maggie Walsh's killer.

episodes.name: This Year's Girl (1)
episodes.overview: Faith awakens from her coma and seeks revenge against Buffy.

episodes.name: Who Are You? (2)
episodes.overview: Having switched bodies with Buffy, Faith enjoys freedom. Meanwhile, Buffy finds herself at the mercy of the Watcher's Council.

episodes.name: Superstar
episodes.overview: Buffy senses that something is amiss when Jonathan becomes a hero to everyone in Sunnydale.

episodes.name: Where the Wild Things Are
episodes.overview: Buffy and Riley's passionate lovemaking energizes supernatural elements inside a frat house.

episodes.name: New Moon Rising
episodes.overview: Oz's return to Sunnydale leads to his incarceration by the Initiative and complicates the relationship between Willow and Tara.

episodes.name: The Yoko Factor (1)
episodes.overview: After joining forces with Adam, Spike drives a wedge between Buffy and her friends. Meanwhile, Angel's return to Sunnydale leads to a violent confrontation with Riley.

episodes.name: Primeval (2)
episodes.overview: Having gained control of Riley's mind, Adam sets in motion his plot to create an army of unstoppable soldiers and destroy the Initiative.

episodes.name: Restless
episodes.overview: Buffy, Willow, Xander, and Giles experience dreams in which they are pursued by a mysterious figure.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Buffy begins college feeling completely overwhelmed...but once the monsters show up, it's just like old times. Then she starts dating Riley, a handsome commando battling the same monsters. He's part of a secret organization called The Initiative, and Buffy is all too happy to join the team. But she soon suspects The Initiative may be more dangerous than the monsters they are supposed to be battling...

episodes.name: Buffy vs. Dracula
episodes.overview: The one-and-only Dracula makes his way to Sunnydale and immediately has everyone enchanted. Even Buffy might not be able to resist his charms.

episodes.name: Real Me
episodes.overview: As Harmony and her vampire gang plot Buffy's demise, Dawn adjusts to life with a Slayer.

episodes.name: The Replacement
episodes.overview: When a demon creates a Xander double, the real Xander must convince his friends of his true identity.

episodes.name: Out of My Mind
episodes.overview: While Riley's health begins to deteriorate, Spike and Harmony force a surgeon to remove the behavior modification chip embedded in Spike's brain.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Buffy learns more about Dawn after she discovers a mysterious orb linked to a group of monks being pursued by an incredibly powerful force.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.overview: When relatives arrive in Sunnydale, to celebrate her birthday, Tara uses a magic spell on her friends to keep them from learning her "secret." Meanwhile, Glory unleashes a hoard of demons to hunt down Buffy.

episodes.name: Fool for Love
episodes.overview: After being bested in a fight by an ordinary vampire, Buffy asks Spike to explain how he killed two Slayers many years earlier.

episodes.name: Shadow
episodes.overview: Glory transforms a snake into a terrifying monster in her quest to find the Key; Joyce is hospitalized after being diagnosed with an illness.

episodes.name: Listening to Fear
episodes.overview: As Joyce's sickness makes her begin doing odd things, a demon emerges from a meteorite and begins killing the mentally ill.

episodes.name: Into the Woods
episodes.overview: After Buffy catches Riley in the clutches of a vampire-junkie, Riley makes an important decision regarding their relationship.

episodes.name: Triangle
episodes.overview: While Giles is in England meeting with the Watcher Council, a bickering Anya and Willow mind the magic store and inadvertently conjure up a fearsome troll.

episodes.name: Checkpoint
episodes.overview: The Watcher Council travels to Sunnydale to review Buffy's skills as a Slayer; meanwhile, Glory puts her search for the Key into high gear.

episodes.name: Blood Ties
episodes.overview: When Dawn learns her true identity, she runs away - only to encounter Glory.

episodes.name: Crush
episodes.overview: Buffy learns that Spike has a crush on her - a situation made all the more dangerous by Drusilla's return to Sunnydale.

episodes.name: I Was Made to Love You
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends encounter an incredibly strong female robot with only one thing on its mind - love.

episodes.name: The Body
episodes.overview: Buffy, Dawn, and their friends deal with the aftermath of Joyce's death.

episodes.name: Forever
episodes.overview: With some help from Spike, Dawn attempts to bring Joyce back from the dead.

episodes.name: Intervention
episodes.overview: A weary Buffy seeks to regain focus by embarking on a quest with the First Slayer; Spike cavorts with his very own "Buffybot" and Glory instructs her minions to spy on Buffy's friends in the hopes of ascertaining the Key's true identity.

episodes.name: Tough Love
episodes.overview: When Tara falls victim to Glory's incredible power, Willow embraces dark magic and launches a counterattack.

episodes.name: Spiral
episodes.overview: Realizing they may never be able to vanquish Glory, Buffy and the gang decide to flee Sunnydale in Spike's R.V. to protect Dawn.

episodes.name: The Weight of the World
episodes.overview: When Buffy lapses into a catatonic state, Willow uses magic to find out why; a tug-of-war erupts between Glory and Ben over Dawn's ultimate fate.

episodes.name: The Gift
episodes.overview: As Glory prepares Dawn for a bloodletting ritual that will open a portal to another dimension, Buffy and her friends prepare for battle.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: After an unsettling encounter with the Dracula, Buffy asks Giles to once again be her Watcher. Luckily he agrees, for Buffy is about to face mortal problems far more threatening than the undead.

episodes.name: Bargaining (1)
episodes.overview: The gang hope to bring Buffy back from the dead. Meanwhile, motorcycle-riding demons discover the Buffybot has been posing as the Slayer.

episodes.name: Bargaining (2)
episodes.overview: As the Hellions continue to ravage Sunnydale, a feral Buffy claws her way out of her own grave and must come to the aid of her friends.

episodes.name: After Life
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends battle a demon that may have hitched a ride with Buffy as she crossed into the world from another dimension.

episodes.name: Flooded
episodes.overview: While trying to get a loan, Buffy runs afoul of three deadbeat sorcerers who are using the otherworldly powers of a demon to rob a bank.

episodes.name: Life Serial
episodes.overview: Buffy's powers are tested by Andrew, Jonathan and Warren, who seek to expose and exploit her weaknesses in an effort to destroy her.

episodes.name: All the Way
episodes.overview: Dawn discovers her crush has a deadly secret. Xander announces his engagement to Anya, and Tara worries about Willow's reliance on magic.

episodes.name: Once More, With Feeling
episodes.overview: In this musical extravaganza, Sunnydale residents find themselves bursting into song, and flame, when a demon attempts to make Dawn his bride.

episodes.name: Tabula Rasa
episodes.overview: While trying to find a way to make Buffy forget about her afterlife experience, Willow inadvertently casts a spell that erases everyone's memories.

episodes.name: Smashed
episodes.overview: Willow turns Amy the Rat into her old self; Jonathan, Warren and Andrew steal a diamond; and Spike discovers something unexpected about Buffy.

episodes.name: Wrecked
episodes.overview: Amy introduces Willow to a warlock whose powerful black magic proves addictive; Buffy and Spike deal with the aftermath of their night of passion.

episodes.name: Gone
episodes.overview: The Three Geeks mistakenly turn Buffy invisible. The Slayer takes some advantage from going unseen. Willow has to do the detective without using magic, while Xander finds Spike doing some weird physical training.

episodes.name: Doublemeat Palace
episodes.overview: When Buffy gets a job at the Doublemeat Palace, a local fast-food restaurant, she begins to believe that disappearing co-workers and the secret ingredient to the restaurant's hamburger may be connected.

episodes.name: Dead Things
episodes.overview: After Jonathan, Andrew, and Warren accidentally kill Warren's ex-girlfriend Katrina, they set Buffy up to make her believe it was she who killed the girl.

episodes.name: Older and Far Away
episodes.overview: After Dawn talks to a guidance counselor about her feeling lonely, she accidentally puts a spell on Buffy and her friends, trapping them inside the Summer's house with a sword-wielding demon.

episodes.name: As You Were
episodes.overview: Buffy's old boyfriend, Riley Finn, shows up unexpectedly as he tracks a demon about to hatch eggs that could wipe out Sunnydale.

episodes.name: Hell's Bells
episodes.overview: Anya and Xander's wedding is thrown into turmoil when a man claiming to be Xander's future self turns up at the ceremony.

episodes.name: Normal Again
episodes.overview: After Buffy is stung by a demon, she begins to have vivid day-dreams about a mental asylum. She gradually begins to believe that she is a crazy girl back in L.A and that Sunnydale and all her friends are just a figment of her imagination.

episodes.name: Entropy
episodes.overview: Anya returns to Sunnydale, bent on revenge for Xander leaving her at the altar. She has since become a Vengence demon again, but ends up hurting Xander in a way she never expected.

episodes.name: Seeing Red
episodes.overview: Willow and Tara wallow in their togetherness, but things aren't as happy everywhere else. Buffy has to face both Xander and Spike, whilst tracking Warren and Company to foil their next move.

episodes.name: Villains
episodes.overview: A vengeful Willow uses her enormous power to track down Warren, despite Buffy's strong feelings about targeting humans.

episodes.name: Two to Go
episodes.overview: Fueled by black magic, Willow targets Andrew and Jonathan, leading to a battle between Buffy and Willow; Spike fights an unstoppable foe.

episodes.name: Grave
episodes.overview: After sucking all the energy out of Giles, a powerful Willow sets off to destroy the world.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Elated with having Buffy back from the dead, her friends never wonder if she may have been in a better place.

episodes.name: Lessons
episodes.overview: Sunnydale High is re-opened, with a new designed campus and a new principal, Robin Wood. It is Dawn's first day at school there and Buffy accompanies her to class, only to discover evil spirits lurking in the basement.

episodes.name: Beneath You
episodes.overview: A giant worm-like creature begins stalking a young woman. As the gang begin to investigate, they realise it's appearance in Sunnydale may be linked to Anya.

episodes.name: Same Time, Same Place
episodes.overview: Willow's return proves problematic when she is literally unable to see her friends--and is left with a creature that paralyzes its victims.

episodes.name: Help
episodes.overview: Buffy begins a new job as school counsellor at Sunnydale High. On her first day she encounters a troubled young girl who is convinced she is about to die.

episodes.name: Selfless
episodes.overview: Anya's violent and deadly act of vengeance leaves everyone stunned. Buffy must put aside her feelings and take action before more people die.

episodes.name: Him
episodes.overview: Xander and Spike search for the source of a spell that has bewitched the girls into competing for the affections of the high school quarterback.

episodes.name: Conversations with Dead People
episodes.overview: Buffy strikes up a conversation with a vampire who was once an acquaintance in high school. Dawn defends Joyce from a menacing creature.

episodes.name: Sleeper
episodes.overview: Buffy and her friends fear Spike may be to blame when a number of people around town mysteriously disappear.

episodes.name: Never Leave Me
episodes.overview: Buffy hopes to learn more about what she's up against with the First by taking Spike prisoner; Xander and Anya interrogate Andrew.

episodes.name: Bring on the Night
episodes.overview: Giles returns to Sunnydale with three potential slayers, whom Buffy must protect from The First. Meanwhile, a ferocious Uber-vampire is released from the Hellmouth and Buffy must kill it before it kills one of the potentials.

episodes.name: Showtime
episodes.overview: Buffy has to keep the ever increasing number of potential Slayers from panicking while Giles and Anya seek answers from the Beljoxa's Eye.

episodes.name: Potential
episodes.overview: Buffy takes the Potentials to a demon bar and then to Spike's crypt, in order to teach them the art of slaying. When Willow casts a spell to seek out the next Potential, the spell leads them to believe that Dawn may be a future slayer.

episodes.name: The Killer in Me
episodes.overview: After Willow and Kennedy share their first kiss, Willow is transformed into Warren, the man she killed last year. When she sets out to find help, she bumps into an old friend. Meanwhile, Buffy searches for answers when Spike's chip causes him great pain, and the gang suspect that Giles may really be The First Evil.

episodes.name: First Date
episodes.overview: Buffy accepts an invitation to dinner from Principal Wood, and the secrets of his past are revealed. Xander impresses a beautiful girl with his knowledge of rope, and she seems to be interested in tying him up. Meanwhile, the First contacts Andrew in another attempt to destroy the Potentials, and Giles finds himself tongue-tied with the new Potential, Chao-Ahn.

episodes.name: Get It Done
episodes.overview: The Scoobies use a spell to transport Buffy into a shadow world, where she meets the men who created the first slayer. However, in order for her to return home, the gang must find and slay a ferocious demon.

episodes.name: Storyteller
episodes.overview: Andrew creates a documentary called "Buffy, Slayer of the Vampyres", a record of the current situation in Sunnydale to show to future generations. He manages to capture many important moments, and to annoy almost everyone in the house. But Buffy needs to tear him away from his filmmaking because the Seal of Danzalthar is active and Andrew may hold the key to closing it before it destroys the town.

episodes.name: Lies My Parents Told Me
episodes.overview: Robin Wood seeks revenge on Spike for killing his mother nearly 30 years ago, whilst everyone else tries to find out how The First has control over him.

episodes.name: Dirty Girls
episodes.overview: Faith returns to Sunnydale just as a new villain, Caleb, arrives and sends Buffy a message in the form of a badly beaten Potential. Buffy leads the rest of the girls to Caleb and The First's lair, with devastating consequences.

episodes.name: Empty Places
episodes.overview: After their horrifying loss at the vineyard, the gang turn against Buffy and begin to follow Faith instead. Meanwhile, Spike and Andrew travel to an old church to question a priest about Caleb.

episodes.name: Touched
episodes.overview: Faith and the Potentials search underground for a weapon, whilst Buffy confronts Caleb at the vineyard.

episodes.name: End of Days
episodes.overview: Buffy has a powerful new weapon, but the gang cannot find any information about the origins of the mysterious scythe. Eventually the Slayer goes herself in search of knowledge, and finds a new ally, an old friend, and great danger.

episodes.name: Chosen
episodes.overview: After killing Caleb, Buffy conceives a plan to defeat the First once and for all. Willow invokes a magic spell that alters the ancient Slayer spell and gives Buffy the allies she needs to fight the Uber-Vamp army. An epic battle ensues and several good friends are lost. At the end, Buffy faces a completely new problem -- one she's glad to have.

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: As Buffy accompanies Dawn on her first day at the new Sunnydale High, Giles continues Willow's magic education in England. But while Buffy is surprised to be offered a guidance counselor job, Willow is shocked to experience a horrific future vision of the Hellmouth.
